relatedBlades.title: The Cloudflare Trust Hub
relatedBlades.subtitle: Policies, technologies, and certifications that help us earn customer trust
relatedBlades.copy:
Trust is the foundation of Cloudflare's business. We earn our users' trust by respecting the sanctity of personal data transiting our network, and by being transparent about how we handle and secure that data.

Read on to explore the policies, technologies, and third-party certifications that make this trust possible.

relatedBlades.title: Privacy & data protection
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare builds data privacy into everything we do. Learn about our privacy policy, our data localization products, and our approach to regulations like the GDPR.

relatedBlades.title: Certifications and compliance resources
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare protects our customers and their users by complying with a wide range of important security certifications. Explore our posture around ISO 27001:2013, ISO 27701:2019, PCI DSS 3.2.1, SOC 2 Type II, and others.

relatedBlades.title: Trust-focused technologies
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare gives you the tools to keep data secure and private. Learn how our network supports end-to-end encryption, identity and access management, data localization, and more.

relatedBlades.title: Trust & safety
relatedBlades.copy: Transparency is key to earning our customers' trust. Learn about how we respond to law enforcement requests for user data and reports of abuse on our network.

relatedBlades.quote: We appreciated Cloudflare's responsiveness to our security and privacy needs. As an organization, we are very sensitive to privacy concerns.

features.title: GDPR compliance
features.description: Learn how European organizations use Cloudflare to meet their data protection obligations.

features.title: Privacy policy
features.description: Explore in detail how we keep private the data transiting our network.

features.title: Encryption
features.description: Learn about Cloudflare's options for certificate management, encryption key storage, and more.

features.title: Transparency report
features.description: Get our semiannual updates on requests we receive from law enforcement and other governmental entities.

features.title: Data localization suite
features.description: The Cloudflare network lets you choose the locations of data centers where your traffic is inspected

features.title: Privacy-first analytics
features.description: Learn how Cloudflare Analytics provides accurate website data without cookies or client-side storage.

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by millions of Internet properties
